mainEntity.name: What is Klaviyo and why is it important for e-commerce?

acceptedAnswer.text: Klaviyo is a powerful email marketing automation platform specifically designed for e-commerce businesses. It integrates seamlessly with platforms like Shopify to provide advanced segmentation, personalization, and automation capabilities that can significantly increase revenue and customer lifetime value.

mainEntity.name: How much does Klaviyo automation setup cost?

acceptedAnswer.text: The cost varies depending on your specific needs, current email list size, and complexity of automation flows required. We offer free consultations to assess your needs and provide custom pricing. Contact us for a personalized quote.

mainEntity.name: Do you work with businesses outside of Romania?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, we work with clients worldwide. Our services are delivered remotely, and we have experience working with e-commerce businesses across Europe, North America, and other regions.
